entry.summary: Re 2) Provide liquidity You can provide liquidity on either @0xPolygon or @gnosischain using either $USDC or $DAI. As an LP you'r exposed to virtually all betting markets and earning on the spreads. It's an opportunity to get 1-click exposure to thousands of betting markets.

$BLUR is live. 12% of the token supply has been airdropped to early users and NFT traders. 3 billion tokens in total. Token is trading at $0.52 ( $1.5b fdv) at the time of this tweet. Gas is super high right now, you may want to wait before claiming:
DeFi Airdrops ðŸ¦‡ðŸ”Š:â€‚$BLUR token launch in around 11 hours ðŸ”¥ Care packages collected in 3 airdrop rounds will be opened. Coinbase Assets:â€‚Coinbase will add support for Blur (BLUR) on the Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). Do not send this asset over other networks or your funds may be lost. Inbound transfers for this asset are available on @Coinbase & @CoinbaseExch in the regions where trading is supported.

entry.summary: Re The exact % of supply airdropped has not been announced yet but Blur has stressed multiple times that it wants to be seen as the community owned NFT marketplace so a high % seems likely. Tokenomics have not been announced yet but will be announced at launch.

entry.title: Re This was not risk-free however, these traders had to place bids close to floor prices of high-volume collections. These thick bid walls has turned ...
entry.summary: Re This was not risk-free however, these traders had to place bids close to floor prices of high-volume collections. These thick bid walls has turned Blur into one of the most liquid venues to trade NFTs on Ethereum. Today, it's almost on par with Opensea in terms of daily volume.
